• {{ location.name }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../core/services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-location', templateUrl: './location.component.html', styleUrls: ['./location.component.scss'], }) export class LocationComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private apiService: ApiService) {} locations: any[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { this.apiService .getLocations() .subscribe((response) => (this.locations = response)); } }
